sense.name: a cue given to someone for assistance
sense.examples: The teacher gave the children prompts when it was their turn to walk on stage. The actor got a prompt for his next line from the prompter in the pit. John asked Mary out for a date without any prompts from me.

sense.name: symbol on a computer monitor that indicates readiness for input
sense.examples: John typed a Unix command at the prompt. The prompt symbols for different Unix shells are different.

sense.name: the time limit imposed on repayment of an account
sense.examples: The prompt on this promissory note is 90 days.
